channel.title: Maria T. M. Dijkstra on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Maria T. M. Dijkstra on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: The Bright and Dark Side of Gossip for Cooperation in Groups
item.description: Two studies indicate gossip has positive and negative aspects for cooperation in groups, these aspects depend on situational factors and agent perspectives.
